user_query: My company is organizing a team-building event and we are looking for outdoor activities. Can you provide me with some fun and engaging team-building activities that can be done in a natural setting? It would be great if you could also suggest some locations in our city where we can hold these activities.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of fun and engaging outdoor team-building activities suitable for a corporate event.
Identify suitable locations in the city for hosting the outdoor team-building activities.
Combine the activities list with the suggested locations to create a comprehensive proposal for the team-building event.
